quotes: You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.
Don't seek, don't search, don't ask, don't knock, don't demand ? relax.
Would you rather learn to deal with the truth now than be forced to do so later on?
Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned.
The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
Confidence breeds beauty.
The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
Live your life as an exclamation rather than an explanation.
A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
Be - don't try to become
Success is about doing the right thing, not about doing everything right.
Each day provides it's own gifts.
We are all here for some special reason.
The hard path is often the right one. The river teaches more than the shore.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
It isn't what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about it.
Wherever you are, it's the place you need to be.
Faults are yours to fix, not to curse.
Don't criticize what you can't understand.
The giving of love is an education in itself.
Belief creates the actual fact.
I was wise enough to never grow up while fooling most people into believing I had.
You find peace not by rearranging the circumstances of your life, but by realizing who you are at the deepest level.
Mistake is a mistake only if you make it twice.
Make no small plans for they have no power to stir the soul.
None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
The greatest doer must also be a great dreamer.
Words are clothes that thoughts wear
It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
True love stories never have endings.
Bloom where you are planted!
Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else.
Self-control is strength.
Our stories may be singular, but our destination is shared.
The sculptor produces the beautiful statue by chipping away such parts of the marble block as are not needed - it is a process of elimination.
You're always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.
Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness but it is greatness.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
You can have it all. You just can't have it all at once.
Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.
You can easily judge the character of a man by how he treats those who can do nothing for him.
The foolish reject what they see, not what they think; the wise reject what they think, not what they see.
The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.
Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
Stay away from people who makes you feel like you are wasting their time.
